Class Underling

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Critter
        • Underling

  • public class Underling
extends info.gridworld.actor.Critter
    An Underling is spawned when a RealAlphasUseVSCode object encounters another actor. The RealAlphasUseVSCode uses infects the enemy, turning it into an Underling. The Underling only serves as a zombie-like infection mechanism, and in all other purposes acts like a Critter.

      void removeSelfFromGrid()

    • Method Detail

      • processActors

        public void processActors(java.util.ArrayList<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> actors)
        An Underling processes its list of Actors by checking if each Actor meets the criteria to be infected. To be infected, the enemy Actor must not be of type RealAlphasUseVSCode or Underling.
        Overrides:
        processActors in class info.gridworld.actor.Critter
